The top recommended link is "Waste and recycling | Essex County Council" (Number: 1), with a confidence score of 90. It provides comprehensive information on waste and recycling services, which aligns best with the customer's need for council customer information. The second and third recommendations are "Contact us | Essex County Council" (Number: 2) and "draft - waste strategy for essex 2024 - 2054" (Number: 6), both having relevant content and scoring above the minimum confidence threshold of 0.6.
